etymology.description: 雨 (rain) + 伞 (umbrella/parasol) = umbrella for rain.
etymology.interpretation: Names a canopy used to keep off rain. By specifying 雨, distinguishes it from a sunshade (阳伞).
etymology.simplification: 傘 was simplified to 伞 by reducing strokes to an umbrella-shaped outline; 雨 is unchanged.

examples.chinese: 今天下雨(今天下雨)，记得带雨伞(記得帶雨傘)。
examples.pinyin: jīntiān xià yǔ, jìde dài yǔsǎn.
examples.english: It’s raining today; remember to bring an umbrella.

examples.chinese: 这把雨伞很轻(這把雨傘很輕)。
